name: TRASH BEATERS MF
description:
First of all, the game is short because we didn't want to extend the time by getting the same done.

This is a game made for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam 24# by 2 creators who were since 5 year to developing games. The game was a bit simple because we wanted it to be so . 

A game where you clean up space and split objects into atoms with your weapon

Hope you like it!

CONTROLS:

  • FIRST CHAPTER:
  1. Left mouse button -> Shoot laser & move around
  2. Mouse movements -> Look around
  • SECOND CHAPTER:
  1. W A S D -> fly around
  2. Left mouse button -> Shoot laser 
  3. Mouse Up & Down -> fly up and down

Used assets: 

  • Google Poly
  • TurboSquid 3D Model website
  • Kennys
